ks.common.model

Interface IContextualize


  • public interface IContextualize
    When a Move is generated on one client and shipped to another client for processing, it must be 'recontextualized' so as to properly hook up with the ModelElements as found on the remote client.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void recontextualize(Solitaire theGame)
      It is the responsibility of the Move object to locate its context given the game argument.

    • Method Detail

      • recontextualize

        void recontextualize(Solitaire theGame)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        It is the responsibility of the Move object to locate its context given the game argument.
        Parameters:
        theGame -
        Throws:
        if - unable to properly determine new context
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
